verbs.description: [ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MNR: visibly] [V: resisted] [ARG1: holding Donald Trump ’s hand at the White House] , [ARGM-LOC: in front of French President Emmanuel Macron and his wife , Brigitte] .
